mapper.select: select * from QUERY WHERE PRODSEQ=#{prodSeq} order by QUERYSEQ
select * from QUERY query, PRODUCT prod where prod.PRODSEQ = query.PRODSEQ AND query.CUSSEQ=#{cusSeq}
select * from QUERY query, PRODUCT prod where prod.PRODSEQ = query.PRODSEQ AND prod.SELLERSEQ = #{sellerSeq}
select * from QUERY query, PRODUCT prod where prod.PRODSEQ = query.PRODSEQ AND query.QUERYSEQ=#{querySeq}
mapper.insert: insert into QUERY (QUERYSEQ, OPEN, PRODSEQ, CUSSEQ, TITLE, CONTENT) values (QUERYSEQ.nextval, #{open}, #{prodSeq}, #{cusSeq}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update QUERY set OPEN=#{open}, TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, REPLY=#{reply} where QUERYSEQ=#{querySeq}
